title: migrate in collections api not working
description: When migrating with the same query that was given in collection api , There was no docs that were migrated from A -> B. Please help me to proceed.

comments.content:
Please raise this question on the user's list at solr-user@lucene.apache.org, there are a lot more people watching that list who may be able to help. 

If it's determined that this is a code issue in Solr and not a configuration/usage problem, we can raise a JIRA.

When you do raise the issue on the JIRA list, you must include enough detail to help us help you. Exactly what command did you use? Was there any useful information in the logs? etc.
comments.author: Erick Erickson
